content.text:
# 4th Parliament of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus

This is a list of members of parliament (MPs) elected to the Assembly of the Republic for the 4th Parliament of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus at the 1998 parliamentary election, which was held on 6 December 1998.
The list below indicates the MPs in the parties in which they were elected.
{| class=wikitable style="border:1px solid #8888aa; background-color:#f7f8ff; padding:0px; font-size:90%;"
|-
! colspan="2"|Party
! Members
! Change
! Proportion
|-
| style="background: #FF7F00" | || National Unity Party || 24 || 8 || 48%
|-
| style="background: #DC241f" | || Democratic Party || 13 || 5 || 26%
|-
| style="background: #B22222" | || Communal Liberation Party || 7 || 2 || 14%
|-
| style="background: #008000" | || Republican Turkish Party || 6 || 7  || 12%
|-
| colspan="2" | Total || 50 || || 100%
|-
